column1: 0023|twenty-three minutes past midnight|Oskar weighed the wristwatch in his hand
column2: then gave the rather fine piece with its luminous dial showing twenty-three minutes past midnight to little Pinchcoal. He looked up inquiringly at his chief. St√∂rtebeker nodded his assent. And Oskar said
column3: as he adjusted his drum snugly for the trip home: "Jesus will lead the way. Follow thou me!"
